title: Matt Bishop: Alonso & Stroll are about to make mind-boggling F1 history
summary: On one side of the Aston Martin garage is one of F1's most devastatingly effective drivers. On the other is one who's frequently lacklustre. And yet Fernando Alonso and Lance Stroll are about to hit a historic benchmark

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is known for being one of F1's most effective competitors?
What team do Fernando Alonso and Lance Stroll drive for?
Which driver is often described as frequently lacklustre in performance?
